mean_cn: v.献给（把书籍、戏剧、演出等）
mean_en: "to give a lot of your time and effort to a particular activity or purpose because you think it is important; to say at the beginning of a book
sentence: He tells the journalist that his new book is dedicated to his daughter.
sentence_trans: 他告诉记者他的新书是献给他女儿的。
word_etyma: de加强 + dic说 + ate使，造成 → 再说 → 努力献身
